java
// SqlSessionFactory --> SqlSession 
public class MybatisUtils {
    public static SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory;
    static {
        try {
            // ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ è·å–SqlSessionFactoryå¯¹è±¡
            String resource =** **"mybatis-config.xml;
            InputStream inputStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream(resource);
            sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(inputStream);
        } catch (IOException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
    // æ—¢ç„¶æœ‰äº† SqlSessionFactoryï¼Œé¡¾åæ€ä¹‰ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä»ä¸­è·å¾— SqlSession çš„å®ä¾‹ã€‚
    // SqlSession æä¾›äº†åœ¨æ•°æ®åº“æ‰§è¡Œ SQL å‘½ä»¤æ‰€éœ€çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ–¹æ³•ã€‚
    // ä½ å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ SqlSession å®ä¾‹æ¥ç›´æ¥æ‰§è¡Œå·²æ˜ å°„çš„ SQL è¯­å¥ã€‚
    public static SqlSession getSqlSession() {
        return sqlSessionFactory.openSession();
    }
}

2-4-4. æµ‹è¯•

public class UserDaoTest1 {
    @Test
    public void run1() {
        SqlSession sqlSession = MybatisUtils.getSqlSession();
        // æ–¹å¼ä¸€ï¼šgetMapper()----->æ¨è
        UserDao mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(UserDao.class);
        List<User> list = mapper.getUserList();
        // æ–¹å¼äºŒï¼šselect...()
        list = sqlSession.selectList("getUserList");
        for(User user : list) { 
            System.out.println(user);
        }
        sqlSession.close();
    }
}

java
public void mapRun() {
        SqlSession sqlSession = MybatisUtils.getSqlSession();
        UserMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(UserMapper.class);
        Map<String, Object> map = new HashMap<String, Object>();
        map.put("userid", 5);
        map.put("userpwd", "123456");
        mapper.updataPwd(map);
        sqlSession.commit();
        sqlSession.close();
    }

    <!--å…ˆå®šä¹‰æ‰€æœ‰çš„appender-->
    <appenders>
        <!--è¿™ä¸ªè¾“å‡ºæ§åˆ¶å°çš„é…ç½®-->

        </File>
        <!-- è¿™ä¸ªä¼šæ‰“å°å‡ºæ‰€æœ‰çš„infoåŠä»¥ä¸‹çº§åˆ«çš„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡å¤§å°è¶…è¿‡sizeï¼Œåˆ™è¿™sizeå¤§å°çš„æ—¥å¿—ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å­˜å…¥æŒ‰å¹´ä»½-æœˆä»½å»ºç«‹çš„æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸‹é¢å¹¶è¿›è¡Œå‹ç¼©ï¼Œä½œä¸ºå­˜æ¡£-->
        <RollingFile name="RollingFileInfo" fileName="${sys:user.home}/logs/info.log"
                     filePattern="${sys:user.home}/logs/$${date:yyyy-MM}/info-%d{yyyy-MM-dd}-%i.log">
            <!--æ§åˆ¶å°åªè¾“å‡ºlevelåŠä»¥ä¸Šçº§åˆ«çš„ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆonMatchï¼‰ï¼Œå…¶ä»–çš„ç›´æ¥æ‹’ç»ï¼ˆonMismatchï¼‰-->

                <TimeBasedTriggeringPolicy/>
                <SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy size="100 MB"/>
            </Policies>
        </RollingFile>
        <RollingFile name="RollingFileWarn" fileName="${sys:user.home}/logs/warn.log"
                     filePattern="${sys:user.home}/logs/$${date:yyyy-MM}/warn-%d{yyyy-MM-dd}-%i.log">

                <SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy size="100 MB"/>
            </Policies>

            <DefaultRolloverStrategy max="20"/>
        </RollingFile>
        <RollingFile name="RollingFileError" fileName="${sys:user.home}/logs/error.log"

                <TimeBasedTriggeringPolicy/>
                <SizeBasedTriggeringPolicy size="100 MB"/>
            </Policies>
        </RollingFile>
    </appenders>
    <!--ç„¶åå®šä¹‰loggerï¼Œåªæœ‰å®šä¹‰äº†loggerå¹¶å¼•å…¥çš„appenderï¼Œappenderæ‰ä¼šç”Ÿæ•ˆ-->

        <logger name="org.springframework" level="INFO"></logger>

            <appender-ref ref="RollingFileInfo"/>
            <appender-ref ref="RollingFileWarn"/>
            <appender-ref ref="RollingFileError"/>

</configuration>

6-3-5. log4jçš„æ˜¾ç¤º

6-3-6. ç®€å•åº”ç”¨

@Test
public void log4jTest() {
    Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(MyTest.class);
    logger.info("[info]:MyTest.log4jTest()......");
    logger.debug("[debug]:MyTest.log4jTest()......");
    logger.error("[error]:MyTest.log4jTest()......");

7. åˆ†é¡µ â€‹

  • ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¦åˆ†é¡µï¼šå‡å°‘æ•°æ®çš„å¤„ç†é‡

7-1. ä½¿ç”¨limitåˆ†é¡µ â€‹

7-1-1. è¯­æ³•

sql
select * from user limit 0, 2;     # star, step

7-1-2. æ¥å£UserMapper.java

xml
// åˆ†é¡µæŸ¥è¯¢
List<User> getUserByLimit(Map<String, Object> map);

7-1-3. UserMapper.xml

xml
<!--    åˆ†é¡µå®ç°-->
<resultMap id="userlimit" type="User">
    <result column="pwd" property="password"/>
</resultMap>
<select id="getUserByLimit" parameterType="map" resultMap="userlimit">
    select * from user limit #{star}, #{step}; 
</select>

7-1-4. æµ‹è¯•

java
public void limitTest() {
    SqlSession sqlSession = MybatisUtils.getSqlSession();
    UserMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(UserMapper.class);
    Map<String, Object> map = new HashMap<String, Object>();
    map.put("star", 4);
    map.put("step", 2);
    List<User> l = mapper.getUserByLimit(map);
    for (User user : l) {
        System.out.println(user);
    }
    sqlSession.close();
}

public void selectAll() {
    SqlSession sqlSession = MybatisUtils.getSqlSession();
    UserMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(UserMapper.class);
    List<User> userList = mapper.getUserList();
    for (User user : userList) {
        System.out.println(user);
    }
    sqlSession.close();
}

8-4. CRUD â€‹

æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥åœ¨å·¥å…·ç±»åˆ›å»ºçš„æ—¶å€™å®ç°è‡ªåŠ¨æäº¤äº‹åŠ¡

java
public static SqlSession getSqlSession() {
    return sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
}
java
public interface UserMapper {
    // æŸ¥è¯¢å…¨éƒ¨
    @Select("select * from user")
    List<User> getUserList();
    // æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢å•ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·
    @Select("select * from user where id = #{id}")      // å½“å½¢å‚æœ‰å¤šä¸ªæ—¶ï¼Œåœ¨æ‰€æœ‰å‚æ•°å‰åŠ ä¸Š@Param("")æ³¨è§£
    User getUserById(@Param("id") int id);
    // insertä¸€ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·
    @Insert("insert into user (id, name, pwd) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{pwd})")
    int addUser(User user);

    // ä¿®æ”¹ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
    @Update("update user set name = #{name}, pwd = #{pwd} where id = #{id}")
    int updataUser(User user);
    // åˆ é™¤ä¸€ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·
    @Delete("delete from user where id = #{id}")
    int delUser(int id);
}
java
public class MyTest {
    @Test
    public void selectAll() {
        SqlSession sqlSession = MybatisUtils.getSqlSession();
        UserMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(UserMapper.class);
        List<User> userList = mapper.getUserList();
        for (User user : userList) {
            System.out.println(user);
        }
        sqlSession.close();
    }
    @Test
    public void selectOne() {
        SqlSession sqlSession = MybatisUtils.getSqlSession();
        UserMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(UserMapper.class);

        User userById = mapper.getUserById(2);
        System.out.println(userById);

        sqlSession.close();
    }
    @Test
    public void insertOne() {
        SqlSession sqlSession = MybatisUtils.getSqlSession();
        UserMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(UserMapper.class);

        User user = new User(7, "å°å°", "112233");
        int i = mapper.addUser(user);
        if (i == 1) {
            System.out.println("addUseræˆåŠŸ");
        }

        sqlSession.close();
    }
    @Test
    public void updata() {
        SqlSession sqlSession = MybatisUtils.getSqlSession();
        UserMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(UserMapper.class);

        User user = new User(4, "æ‚ ç±³", "admin");
        int i = mapper.updataUser(user);
        if (i == 1) {
            System.out.println("ä¿®æ”¹æˆåŠŸ");
        }

        sqlSession.close();
    }
    @Test
    public void delOne() {
        SqlSession sqlSession = MybatisUtils.getSqlSession();
        UserMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(UserMapper.class);

        int i = mapper.delUser(7);
        if (i == 1) {
            System.out.println("delæˆåŠŸ");
        }

        sqlSession.close();
    }
}

CREATE TABLE teacher(
id INT(10) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(30) DEFAULT NULL
)ENGINE=INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

INSERT INTO teacher (id, name) VALUES (1, 'ç§¦è€å¸ˆ' );

CREATE TABLE student(
id INT(10) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(30) DEFAULT NULL,
tid INT(10)DEFAULT NULL,
KEY fktid (tid) ,
CONSTRAINT fktid FOREIGN KEY (tid) REFERENCES teacher(id)
)ENGINE=INNODB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

INSERT INTO student(id, name, tid) VALUES (1, 'å°æ˜', 1);
INSERT INTO student(id, name, tid) VALUES (2, 'å°çº¢', 1);
INSERT INTO student(id, name, tid) VALUES (3, 'å°å¼ ', 1);
INSERT INTO student(id, name, tid) VALUES (4, 'å°æ', 1);
INSERT INTO student(id, name, tid) VALUES (5, 'å°ç‹', 1);

        PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Config 3.0//EN"

    <properties resource="db.properties"/>
    <settings>
        <setting name="logImpl" value="STDOUT_LOGGING"/>
    </settings>
    <typeAliases>
        <package name="com.demo1.pojo"/>
    </typeAliases>
    <environments default="development">
        <environment id="development">
            <transactionManager type="JDBC"/>
            <dataSource type="POOLED">
                <property name="driver" value="${driver}"/>
                <property name="url" value="${url}"/>
                <property name="username" value="${username}"/>
                <property name="password" value="${password}"/>
            </dataSource>
        </environment>
    </environments>
    <mappers>
        <mapper class="com.demo1.mapper.TeacherMapper"/>
        <mapper class="com.demo1.mapper.StudentMapper"/>
    </mappers>
</configuration>
  1. å·¥å…·ç±»
java
public class MybatisUtils {
    public static SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory;
    static {
        try {
            String reources = "mybatis-config.xml";
            InputStream inputStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream(reources);
            sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(inputStream);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
    public static SqlSession getSqlSession() {
        return sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
    }
}

  1. ç›®å½•ç»“æ„æˆªå›¾

10-2 å®ä¾‹ï¼š æŸ¥è¯¢æ‰€æœ‰å­¦ç”Ÿï¼ŒåŠå¯¹åº”è€å¸ˆ â€‹

æ–¹å¼ä¸€ã€ åˆ†ä¸¤ä¸ªæŸ¥è¯¢æ€è·¯ï¼šselect * from student;ã€select * from teacher where id = #{id};

java
public interface StudentMapper {
    // æŸ¥è¯¢æ‰€æœ‰å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œä»¥åŠå¯¹åº”è€å¸ˆçš„ä¿¡æ¯
    /**
     * select s.id, s.name, t.id, t.name from student s, teacher t
     * where s.tid = t.id
     */
    public List<Student> getStudent();
    public Teacher getTeacherByTid(int tid);
}
xml
<mapper namespace="com.demo1.mapper.StudentMapper">
<!--
    select s.id, s.name, t.id, t.name from student s, teacher t where s.tid = t.id
    1. æŸ¥è¯¢æ‰€æœ‰çš„å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯
    2. æ ¹æ®æŸ¥è¯¢å‡ºæ¥å­¦ç”Ÿä¸­çš„tidï¼ŒæŸ¥è¯¢å¯¹åº”çš„è€å¸ˆ
    -->
    <resultMap id="StudentTeacher" type="student">
        <!-- å¤æ‚å±æ€§æ˜ å°„ï¼šassociationæ˜ å°„å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œcollectionæ˜ å°„é›†åˆ -->
        <association property="teacher" column="tid" javaType="teacher" select="getTeacherByTid"/>
    </resultMap>
    <select id="getStudent" resultMap="StudentTeacher">
         select * from student;
    </select>
    <select id="getTeacherByTid" resultType="teacher">
        select * from teacher where id = #{id};
    </select>
</mapper>
java
@Test
    public void selectStuALl() {
        SqlSession sqlSession = MybatisUtils.getSqlSession();
        StudentMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(StudentMapper.class);
        List<Student> studentList = mapper.getStudent();
        for (Student student : studentList) {
            System.out.println(student);
        }
        sqlSession.close();
    }
}

æ–¹å¼äºŒã€ åµŒå¥—å¤„ç†ï¼š

java
select s.id sid, s.name sname, t.id tid, t.name tname 
from student s, teacher t 
where s.tid = tid;
java
public interface StudentMapper {
    // æŸ¥è¯¢æ‰€æœ‰å­¦ç”Ÿä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œä»¥åŠå¯¹åº”è€å¸ˆçš„ä¿¡æ¯
    /**
     * select s.id sid, s.name sname, t.id tid, t.name tname from student s, teacher t
     * where s.tid = tid;
     */
    public List<Student> getStudent2();
}
xml
<mapper namespace="com.demo1.mapper.StudentMapper">
<!--
    select s.id sid, s.name sname, t.id tid, t.name tname from student s, teacher t
    where s.tid = tid;
    -->
    <resultMap id="StudentTeacher2" type="student">
        <result property="id" column="sid"/>
        <result property="name" column="sname"/>
        <association property="teacher" javaType="teacher">
            <result property="id" column="tid"/>
            <result property="name" column="tname"/>
        </association>
    </resultMap>
    <select id="getStudent2" resultMap="StudentTeacher2">
        select s.id sid, s.name sname, t.id tid, t.name tname from student s, teacher t where s.tid = tid
    </select>
</mapper>

  1. å·¥å…·ç±»
java
public class MybatisUtils {
    public static SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory;
    static {
        try {
            String reources = "mybatis-config.xml";
            InputStream inputStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream(reources);
            sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(inputStream);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
    public static SqlSession getSqlSession() {
        return sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
    }
}

public class MyTest {
    @Test
    public void myTest1() {
        SqlSession sqlSession = MybatisUtils.getSqlSession();

        TeacherMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(TeacherMapper.class);
        List<Teacher> teachers = mapper.getTeacher();

            System.out.println(teacher);

        sqlSession.close();

11-2. å®ä¾‹ï¼šæŸ¥è¯¢æŒ‡å®šè€å¸ˆåŠå…¶ä¸‹æ‰€æœ‰å­¦ç”Ÿ â€‹

æ–¹å¼ä¸€ã€å¤šè¡¨æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼š

sql
select s.id sid, s.name sname, t.id tid, t.name
from student s, teacher t
where s.tid = t.id and t.id = #{id};
java
public interface TeacherMapper {
    // è·å–æŒ‡å®šè€å¸ˆä¿¡æ¯åŠå…¶ä¸‹æ‰€æœ‰å­¦ç”Ÿ
    Teacher getTeacher(@Param("tid") int id);
}
xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<!DOCTYPE mapper
        PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN"
        "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd">
<mapper namespace="com.demo1.mapper.TeacherMapper">
    <resultMap id="TeacherStudent" type="teacher">
        <result property="id" column="tid"/>
        <result property="name" column="tname"/>
        <collection property="students" ofType="student">
            <result property="id" column="sid"/>
            <result property="name" column="sname"/>
            <result property="tid" column="tid"/>
        </collection>
    </resultMap>
    <select id="getTeacher" resultMap="TeacherStudent">
        select s.id sid, s.name sname, t.id tid, t.name tname from student s, teacher t
        where s.tid = t.id and t.id = #{tid};
    </select>
</mapper>
java
public class MyTest {

    public void myTest1() {
        SqlSession sqlSession = MybatisUtils.getSqlSession();

        TeacherMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(TeacherMapper.class);
        Teacher teacher = mapper.getTeacher(1);
        System.out.println(teacher);
        sqlSession.close();
    }
}

public class MybatisUtil {
    public static SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory;
    static {
        try {
            String reources = "mybatis-config.xml";
            InputStream inputStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream(reources);
            sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(inputStream);

            e.printStackTrace();

public class IDUtil {
    public static String getID() {
        return UUID.randomUUID().toString().replaceAll("-", "");
    }

  1. ç¼–å†™mapperåŠå¯¹åº”xmlæ–‡ä»¶
java
public interface BlogMapper {
    // æ’å…¥æ•°æ®
    int addBlog(Blog blog);
}
xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<!DOCTYPE mapper
        PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN"
        "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd">
<mapper namespace="com.demo1.dao.BlogMapper">
    <insert id="addBlog" parameterType="blog">
        insert into blog(id, title, author, create_time, views)
        values (#{id}, #{title}, #{author}, #{createTime}, #{views})
    </insert>
</mapper>

13-4. choose(whenã€otherwise) â€‹

    select * from blog

    			author = #{author}
			</when>
    	</choose>
    </where>
</select>

@Test
public void run2() {
    SqlSession sqlSession1 = MybatisUtils.getSqlSession();
    UserMapper mapper1 = sqlSession1.getMapper(UserMapper.class);
    User user1 = mapper1.getUserById(1);
    System.out.println(user1);
    sqlSession1.close();

    SqlSession sqlSession2 = MybatisUtils.getSqlSession();
    UserMapper mapper2 = sqlSession2.getMapper(UserMapper.class);
    User user2 = mapper2.getUserById(1);
    System.out.println(user2);
    sqlSession2.close();
    
    System.out.println("=============================");
    System.out.println(user1==user2);
    
}
